name: Curivari - Reserva Limitada 1000 Series - Reserva 2000
additionalNotes: Curivari Cigars is a relatively new boutique brand that has been amassing a cult following of connoisseurs. The Reserva Limitada series is one of Curivari’s best releases yet, flaunting a versatile array of blends. This superb lineup of Nicaraguan puros features the finest, aged Cuban seed tobaccos, which help develop the full flavor and strength of the blends. Reserva Limitada Classica has an eye-catching mahogany hue and is teeming with dried fruit, nougat, peppercorn and earthy, charred aromas. The Café blend in this magnificent series is an ideal accompaniment to aficionado’s morning coffee with its rich portfolio of espresso, dark chocolate and baker’s spice.
